attributes.action: Help prevent fly tipping in our local communities.
attributes.additional_details:
Because it is overlooked in society and is not seen as big as an issue as it should.
It is destroying local communities in numerous ways thus being:
harming natural reserves and ecosystems 
damaging local attractions which repels tourism affecting our economy
Many of the most common items that are fly tipped have a high plastic content, and so, are non-biodegradable.
There should also be a wider range of possibilities for those in the communities to resolve this issue around illegal tipping
attributes.background:
prevent fly tipping by:
raising awareness
give out more effective consequences to those who do so
e.g. fine, non custodial, custodial sentences

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Start a government "do not drop litter" campaign 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/717322
